alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:24AM AKST until January 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. East winds gusting to 40 mph. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Over elevated terrain of the Upper Koyukuk Valley and Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause low visibility over elevated terrain. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur over elevated terrain such as summits of the Dalton Highway. Valley locations will see winds up to 30 mph and blowing snow. Winds will decrease slowly through the day today, with visibility improving about noon today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; Upper Koyukuk Valley
